name: Ext_R4_ObservationDefinition_identifier
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ObservationDefinition.identifier for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ObservationDefinition.identifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ObservationDefinition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Business identifier for this ObservationDefinition instance
element.definition: A unique identifier assigned to this ObservationDefinition artifact.
element.comment: `ObservationDefinition.identifier` maps to R5 `ObservationDefinition.identifier`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
